record.dc:title: 81HY5 Thompson Village Site 7HY5, Henry County, Tennessee. Feature 12, Partial structure, to the right and Feature 13, Middle Mississippi cemetary, to the left with the daub cleared. Square 26L5. Direction south.
record.wpa:narrative: [Feature 13] Feature 13 is the third cemetery to have been discovered at 7HY5. It has, as yet, been barely touched. It covers, so far, the squares from L24 to L21 inclusive and on the 42 line and 43 line. Twenty-one burials were removed. ... This seemed to be wholly a late or "Mississippian" cemetery. A broken shell, a water bottle, some shell beads, and two gorgets were the only artifacts of importance found within the burials.
record.wpa:comments: Addtional narrative information for Feature 13 on file at the Institution. No narrative information on file for Feature 12. See also photograph 86HY5 [fhm01030].
